get.summary: Retrieve Buyer Organizations by User Email

parameters.description: User email

parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent

createdAt.description: Date and time when the Buyer Organization was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the Buyer Organization was last updated

country.description: Country where the organization is based

zipCode.description: ZIP Code or postal code of the organization's address

complement.description: Complementary information to the organization's address

streetNumber.description: Street number of the organization’s billing and shipping address

neighborhood.description: Neighborhood where the organization is located

state.description: State where the organization is located

city.description: City where the organization is located

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the Buyer Organization address was last updated

companyName.description: Legal corporate name registered by the organization

stateRegistration.description: State registration number of the organization

createdAt.description: Date and time when the Buyer Organization company information was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the Buyer Organization company information was last updated

status.description: Status of the user creation job

schema.description:
If the response is `ALREADY_EXISTS`, there already exists a user that is registered with the provided `email` and associated with the Buyer Organization. 

 If the response is `NOT_FOUND`, the `tenant` does not exist.

get.description: Retrieves the health check status. The `200 OK` response means your requests to the **Buyer Organizations API** are being successfully submitted. If your request results in a timeout, this means the system is unstable or offline.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent

country.description: Country where the organization is based

zipCode.description: ZIP Code or postal code of the organization's address

complement.description: Complementary information to the organization's address

streetNumber.description: Street number of the organization’s billing and shipping address

neighborhood.description: Neighborhood where the organization is located

state.description: State where the organization is located

city.description: City where the organization is located

corporateDocument.description: The organization's tax identification number. Must be consistent with the organization's country. E.g.: the value should be a valid EIN if the organization is based in the USA, or a valid CNPJ if it is based in Brazil

companyName.description: Legal corporate name registered by the organization

stateRegistration.description: State registration number of the organization

name.description: Full name of the Buyer Organization user

password.description: The user's individual password. It should have at least 8 characters, including 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number

password.description: The user's individual password. It should have at least 8 characters, including 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number
